articles.title: King Charles to begin Australia tour with church service - BBC.com
articles.description: King Charles and Queen Camilla are on a six-day tour of Australia, their first since the King ascended to the throne.
articles.content:
The King greets the crowd during a visit to St. Thomas's Anglican Church in Sydney
King Charles and Queen Camillajoined a church congregation in Sydney for a Sunday service on the first day of engag… [+5507 chars]
